oai_dc:dc.dc:title: LX-LR4DistSemEval
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
A collection of language resources for the evaluation of distributional semantic models of Portuguese:
LX-SimLex-999: http://metashare.metanet4u.eu/go2/lx-simlex-999
LX-Rare Word Similarity Data set: http://metashare.metanet4u.eu/go2/lx-rare-word-similarity-dataset
LX-WordSim-353: http://metashare.metanet4u.eu/go2/lx-wordsim-353
LX-ESSLLI 2008: http://metashare.metanet4u.eu/go2/lx-esslli-2008
LX-Battig: http://metashare.metanet4u.eu/go2/lx-battig
LX-AP: http://metashare.metanet4u.eu/go2/lx-ap
LX-4WAnalogies: http://metashare.metanet4u.eu/go2/lx-4wanalogies
LX-4WAnalogiesBR: http://metashare.metanet4u.eu/go2/lx-4wanalogiesbr
They are also publicly available through github: https://github.com/nlx-group
